*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Bastrop, November 3, 1826. Suggestions for legislation—judicial system, digest of laws, sub-political chief, recording titles, land fees, appointment of commissioners to extend titles,*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*To the *person_mentioned*Baron de Bastrop member of the State Legislature from Texas*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*One of the most important subjects to the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*State of Cuahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned* is a speedy organization of the *person_mentioned*Judiciary */person_mentioned*on a system which promises permanency uniformity in the interpretation of laws, and convenience to the *person_mentioned*people*/person_mentioned*—A *person_mentioned*Superior Court*/person_mentioned* to sit at *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*and at *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*alternately, and *person_mentioned*subordinate Circuit Courts*/person_mentioned* would probably be the best. The *person_mentioned*Department of Texas */person_mentioned*might be divided into two Circuits *location_mentioned*from the Sabine to the Baca*/location_mentioned* to form one, and thence *location_mentioned*to the Western limit of the Department*/location_mentioned* to form another, and the *location_mentioned*balance of the State*/location_mentioned* to be divided as circumstances may require with a *person_mentioned*Judge */person_mentioned*in each *location_mentioned*Circuit*/location_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*Circuit Courts*/person_mentioned* might have final appellant Jurisdiction in all cases sent up from *person_mentioned*Alcaldes */person_mentioned*and original jurisdiction in all Civil and Criminal Cases beyond the Jurisdiction of *person_mentioned*Alcaldes*/person_mentioned*, and the *person_mentioned*Superior Court*/person_mentioned* appellant jurisdiction from the Circuit Courts in all civil cases over a certain amount, and original jurisdiction in cases of great importance. The *person_mentioned*Circuit Courts*/person_mentioned* to have jurisdiction in all cases of probate and settling Estates, recording will[s] etc. regulating the rates of ferriage and granting licenses to *person_mentioned*ferrymen*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*tavern keepers*/person_mentioned* etc. etc. and in case the trial by *person_mentioned*jury */person_mentioned*is not allowed their decision in Criminal Cases should be subject to the revisal of some *person_mentioned*Superior tribunal*/person_mentioned* so as not to give one *person_mentioned*man */person_mentioned*the power of deciding finally in Case of Life and death. The Circuit Courts for this Circuit might hold three terms *location_mentioned*at this place*/location_mentioned*, and three terms at *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*in the year; say in this place on the *date_mentioned n="10-xx-xxx">second Mondays of October,*/date_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-xx-xxxx">February*/date_mentioned* and *date_mentioned n="06-xx-xxxx">June*/date_mentioned*, and at *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="12-xx-xxxx">second Mondays of December*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="04-xx-xxxx">April */date_mentioned*and *date_mentioned n="08-xx-xxxx">August*/date_mentioned*. There should be a *person_mentioned*clerk */person_mentioned*appointed at each place where the *person_mentioned*Circuit Courts*/person_mentioned* are held to keep the records of said Court [to] issue process etc and his fees clearly defined by law.*/p*
*p*There should be a *person_mentioned*sheriff */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*alguacil */person_mentioned*in each place where said *person_mentioned*Court */person_mentioned*is held to execute its orders and decrees and his duties and fees defined.*/p*
*p*There should be a *person_mentioned*Notary Public*/person_mentioned* for this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*and one for *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*with his fees clearly defined.*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*jurisdiction */location_mentioned*of the *person_mentioned*Alcaldes */person_mentioned*and their specific duties and powers should be clearly defined even to the furnishing of forms so as to give uniformity to their proceedings.*/p*
*p*Judicial proceedings in the department of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*originally had in the English language when translated by the proper *person_mentioned*person*/person_mentioned* should have the same validity as if originally had in Spanish. Without this the new *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*will be totally debarred all access to courts of Justice for not one in a hundred understands Spanish— Also there should be some provision for the appointment of *person_mentioned*translators */person_mentioned*and their perquisites or fees fixed by law.*/p*
*p*There should be a complete digest of all the laws in force, published in a bound book and generally circulated gratis to every *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*civil judicial*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*militia */person_mentioned*throughout the *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*and sold to the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*on moderate terms*/p*.
*p*Owing to the distance *location_mentioned*from the new Settlements to Bexar*/location_mentioned* and the inconvenience that will arise in Communicating with the Govt by the *person_mentioned*Alcaldes */person_mentioned*individually there should be a *person_mentioned*Gefe Subalterno*/person_mentioned* (Subaltern Civil Chief) to reside at *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* whose authority should extend *location_mentioned*from the Sabine to Labaca*/location_mentioned*, or two *person_mentioned*Chiefs*/person_mentioned* of this description, one for the Country *location_mentioned*from Sabine to Neches*/location_mentioned* and another *location_mentioned*from there to Labaca*/location_mentioned*—This *person_mentioned*Chief */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*Chiefs */person_mentioned*should understand both Spanish and English and be the organ of Communication between the *person_mentioned*Govt */person_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*Alcaldes */person_mentioned*and the other *person_mentioned*subordinate officers*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*jurisdiction*/location_mentioned*, and be a *person_mentioned*subordinate executive officer */person_mentioned*subject to the orders of the *person_mentioned*Chief of Department*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Govor*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*etc.—he should have a *person_mentioned*Secretary */person_mentioned*legally appointed and his fees for translating and other perquisites as well as his duties clearly defined by law. If such a *person_mentioned*chief */person_mentioned*is not appointed great in- convenience will arise in communicating with each *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned* separately by the *person_mentioned*Chief of Department*/person_mentioned* in consequence of the want of a knowledge of the Spanish Language and Customary forms of doing business.*/p*
*p*All deeds or Mortgages for real Estate should be recorded in the *location_mentioned*office of the *person_mentioned*Notary */person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*in a bound book or should there be no *person_mentioned*Notary */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*office of the Clerk of the Circuit Court*/location_mentioned* within three months after they were executed or be void.*/p*
*p*I deem it very important that there should be a clear understanding with the *person_mentioned*Govt */person_mentioned*as to the fees which the *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*can ask and receive from the *person_mentioned*Settlers */person_mentioned*for he must be at a great expence, for *person_mentioned*translators*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Clerks*/person_mentioned*, attending in person to the Surveying, locating the *person_mentioned*Settlers*/person_mentioned*, showing new *person_mentioned*Emigrants */person_mentioned*the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, making presents to *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*, keeping an open house, as he must do for some time for persons who come into explore the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*and many other expences which at first view do not appear important but at the end of a year amt to a large sum.*/p*
*p*Also the manner of running the *location_mentioned*division line along the reserve on the Coast*/location_mentioned* should be defined—The law calls for the " *location_mentioned*Gulf of Mexico */location_mentioned*" as the base, and to leave the margin of the *location_mentioned*Gulf */location_mentioned*and*location_mentioned* meander round the lakes*/location_mentioned* such as *location_mentioned*Galveston */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Matagorda */location_mentioned*will entirely be a departure from the law—it appears to me equally as proper to follow *location_mentioned*up a River*/location_mentioned* to its head because it discharges *location_mentioned*into the Gulf*/location_mentioned* and to begin the measurement there, as to follow *location_mentioned*round the meanders of a Lake or shallow Bay*/location_mentioned* that has a *location_mentioned*narrow inlet*/location_mentioned*. The expense of runing this line will be very great if the *location_mentioned*lakes */location_mentioned*are to be meandered, and who is to pay it. I think the *location_mentioned*line */location_mentioned*ought to be nearly straight and the *location_mentioned*out side of the Coast*/location_mentioned*, that is the *location_mentioned*shore of the " Gulf of Mexico "*/location_mentioned* taken as the base to measure from.*/p*
*p*Many old claims are said to exist on the *location_mentioned*Trinity*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*Neches */location_mentioned*and in the *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches district*/location_mentioned*—there ought to be *person_mentioned*commissioners */person_mentioned*appointed with full power to decide on them finally so that it may be known what *location_mentioned*land*/location_mentioned* is vacant and what is not, if this is not done several claims may be set up for the same *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*and hence will arise endless lawsuits and confusion, and it will also be impossible for the *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*to know what *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*he can settle or what are taken up by previous claims for the records of most of these old claims are said to have been lost in the revolution which renders it difficult to decide from any legal written evidence as to their validity*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-03-1826+">3 November 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
